metadata.description: A marketplace for Claude Code agent configuration plugins

plugins.name: dependency-blocker
plugins.description: Prevents Claude from accessing dependency directories to save tokens

plugins.name: config-wizard
plugins.description: Collection of claude configs to help with configuring and extending claude code.

plugins.name: block-dotfiles
plugins.description: Blocks access to sensitive dotfiles and configuration files that may contain credentials, API keys, and other secrets.

plugins.name: gemini-delegation
plugins.description: Delegate research and web search tasks to Gemini AI via CLI subagent interface.
